newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-ATLETICO MOVE UP TO FOURTH WITH WIN AT HERCULES.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ATLETICO MOVE UP TO FOURTH WITH WIN AT HERCULES.

text.p: Spanish champions Atletico Madrid continued their recent run of good form on Saturday by beating struggling Hercules 2-0 away.
They went ahead midway through the first half when Daniel Prodan headed home a corner. Five minutes later Milinko Pantic finished off a well-worked move to make it 2-0.
Atletico moved up to fourth place in the standings, 10 points behind leaders Real Madrid who play Oviedo in one of nine matches on Sunday.
